title: 08/11/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 08/11/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin gives his takeaway from the first episode of Hard Knocks and why it doesn't look good for Cowboys head coach Mike McCarthy. He has run out of patience for NBA All Star Ben Simmons and believes the 76ers have every right to be upset with their franchise player. He also shares the 5 things he hopes to see in the 2021 NFL season. Plus, former WR T. J. Houshmandzadeh joins the show to preach patience for this top 5 pick in the NFL before we start calling him a bust.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
